preqs: SWK4001. Social Work units are available only within the context of the Bachelor of Social Work degree, or with permission.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {SWK4001}
Must be enrolled in course version {3864, 3964, 3965}

description: This unit provides students with the opportunity to deliver a presentation on their research study. Students will describe the research method and data analysis plan for their honours study. The feedback students receive on their presentation assists in the development of the final version of their research report.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
